examples.example: 无论何时何地，我都会陪着你一起度过困难与美好。

translate.english: No matter when and where, I will accompany you through difficulties and good times.

examples.example: 不管未来道路如何，我都会坚定地陪着你一路前行。

translate.english: No matter how the future path is, I will firmly accompany you all the way forward.

examples.example: 无论风雨彩虹，我都会毅然陪着你追逐梦想。

translate.english: No matter it is wind and rain or rainbow, I will resolutely accompany you to chase your dream.
